about_the_game: Crazy Rabbits is a multiplayer FPS, where you can fight your friends or family. if you don't have any friends or family that want's to play with you, then don't worry, you can just join a random room! you can choose between multiple different types of rabbits with different types of guns. you can run around in multiple different maps with other people around the world. each rabbit has a different set of speed and how high they can jump. so every type of rabbit you pick will all have their pro's and con's, with a cartoony and low poly style, crazy rabbits will give you a fun experience for when you are bored!
detailed_description: Crazy Rabbits is a multiplayer FPS, where you can fight your friends or family. if you don't have any friends or family that want's to play with you, then don't worry, you can just join a random room! you can choose between multiple different types of rabbits with different types of guns. you can run around in multiple different maps with other people around the world. each rabbit has a different set of speed and how high they can jump. so every type of rabbit you pick will all have their pro's and con's, with a cartoony and low poly style, crazy rabbits will give you a fun experience for when you are bored!

name: Crazy Rabbits

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Z
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Crazy Rabbits is a chaotic multiplayer FPS, you play as a rabbit with speed running abilities. you can play with up to 15 people.
